item.title: OMG One Shot - Iron Hounds Reliquary Heist
item.description: Date: 1:30 pm PST, Saturday, September 24, 2022 Session Length: Approx. 3.5 hours [!example] Character Creation Level: 3 Stat Arrangement: Standard Array (15 14 13 12 10 8) Hit Points: Average Wealth: 300gp in addition to starting equipment from class and backgrounds with item availability set to commons only.
